page.title: 11GARAGES AND TRANSPORT PART 2
page.content: There are many garages in Rumblingwell. Centaur Motors is one of them . It is eleven years old and thirteen months ago they changed their dealership from Datsun to Peugeot Talbot . They sell ten types of Peugeot - the 205 , 305, 405, 505, 605 as well as the Talbot Samba, Horizon, Alpine, Minx, and Rapier. In a year the garage sells about five hundred new and second hand cars. The cheapest car of the range is the samba while the most expensive car is the Peugeot 605. The most popular car is the Peugeot 205. | The sales of the garage | * + are divided 50% trade | * + is in new cars while 50% | * + is in used cars.The | * + garage employs fourteen | * + people. |=10% ========== used new
